product.title: Sensitive Skin Face Scrub BKIND - Papaya Enzyme in Multi
product.body_html: Our Sensitive skin face scrub is made with papaya enzymes, a natural and non-abrasive exfoliator. It also contains cranberry and hibiscus powder, shea butter and apricot oil, for a soft, radiant and moisturized skin.
